trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a designer host for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte em tempo de design em um host de designer para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um host designer, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve um controle que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe abstrata é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class provides design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> classe fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> em um host do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> propriedades de classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> propriedade fornece acesso para o designer da fonte de dados, se um for definido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A> propriedade obtém o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> property determines whether the control should render its default action lists for choosing and creating data sources.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> propriedade determina se o controle deve processar suas listas de ação padrão para escolher e criar fontes de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> métodos da classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> method performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> método executa as ações que são necessárias para se conectar à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> method creates a new data source for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> método cria uma nova fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método vincula o controle associado que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe para uma fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A> method performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A> método executa as ações que são necessárias para se desconectar da fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> método obtém uma fonte de dados que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> método constrói uma fonte de dados de exemplo que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove properties from or add additional properties to or to shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método é usado para remover propriedades da ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência dos controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>.

trans-unit.source: The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class is simply a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: O `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` classe é simplesmente uma cópia de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class and places a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> object for the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` on the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> classe e coloca um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> de objeto para o `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` no `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` classe.

trans-unit.source: The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: O `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método para fazer o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> propriedade visível no **propriedades** grade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate the markup for a placeholder if the design time markup is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty>, or if the design-time markup is an empty `<span>` block (that is, if there is no inner markup between the `<span` …`>`
trans-unit.target: Ela substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para gerar a marcação de um espaço reservado, se a marcação de tempo de design é `null` ou <xref:System.String.Empty>, ou se a marcação de tempo de design é vazio `<span>` bloco (ou seja, se não houver nenhuma marcação interna entre o `<span`...`>`

trans-unit.source: and `` tags).
trans-unit.target: e `` marcas).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> classe quando ele cria o controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção da lista de ação de designer para esse designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade cria vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Executa as ações necessárias para se conectar à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a connection to a new data source was performed; <see langword="false" /> if the old and new data source are the same.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se uma conexão com uma nova fonte de dados tiver sido realizada; <see langword="false" /> se as fontes de dados novas e antigas forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> method disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events from the previous data source, and then attaches these events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> método desconecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexa esses eventos para a nova fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new data source for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> method displays a dialog box that can be used to create a data source for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> método exibe uma caixa de diálogo que pode ser usada para criar uma fonte de dados para o controle associado que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" /> to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" /> a associar à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Associa o controle associado à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method first sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control to reference the design-time data source and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método primeiro define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> controle para fazer referência a fonte de dados de tempo de design e conjuntos o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> calls back to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> método do controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe para associar à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Finally, it restores the original values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, ele restaura os valores originais do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `dataBoundControl` parâmetro é o controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe que está associado este designer, ou uma cópia desse controle.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Dá acesso ao designer da fonte de dados, quando um é selecionado para associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />, which implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O designer da fonte de dados do controle associado é derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />, que implementa o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the designer or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados pode ser acessada usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade do designer ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exibição padrão da fonte de dados associada ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView" /> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView" /> que representa o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the designer or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados pode ser acessada usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade do designer ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Executa as ações necessárias para se desconectar da fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A> method disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A> método desconecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> eventos da fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma fonte de dados de exemplo que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa a interface de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> que pode ser usada como uma fonte de dados para controles derivados do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, it is better to use a simple predefined data source at design time rather than the actual data source for the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Por motivos de desempenho, é melhor usar uma fonte de dados predefinidos simples em tempo de design em vez de fonte de dados real para o controle que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma fonte de dados de exemplo que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados para controles derivados de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The sample data constructed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> method has a single node with an empty path.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de exemplo criados com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> método tem um único nó com um caminho vazio.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção implementando o <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da exibição ou adicionar outras propriedades a ela na grade **Propriedades** ou para sombrear propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método cria propriedades de tempo de design para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class to change the **Properties** grid of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> classe para alterar o **propriedades** grade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo faz o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> propriedade visível no **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change the attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para adicionar ou alterar os atributos das propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de chamar o método base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should render its default action lists, which contain a data source ID drop-down list and related tasks.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle deve renderizar suas listas de ações padrão, que contêm uma lista suspensa de ID de fonte de dados e tarefas relacionadas.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default action lists for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class include a **Choose Data Source** menu item that has a drop-down list from which a data source can be selected, and any other action items on the action lists of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Lista a ação padrão para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> classe incluem um **Escolher fonte de dados** item de menu que tem uma lista suspensa da qual uma fonte de dados pode ser selecionada e quaisquer outros itens de ação na lista de ação do controle de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the data source control action lists will include **Configure Data Source** and **Refresh Schema** menu items, although these need not always be present.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a fonte de dados ação de controle de lista incluirá **configurar fonte de dados** e **atualizar esquema** itens de menu, embora eles não deve sempre estar presentes.

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item displays a dialog box that is appropriate to the type of data source chosen.
trans-unit.target: O **configurar fonte de dados** item de menu exibe uma caixa de diálogo que é apropriada para o tipo de escolhido de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, the **Configure Data Source** dialog box allows you to choose a business object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a fonte de dados é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle, o **configurar fonte de dados** caixa de diálogo permite que você escolha um objeto comercial para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.

trans-unit.source: The **Refresh Schema** menu item refreshes the designer schema that is applied by the data source.
trans-unit.target: O **atualizar esquema** item de menu atualiza o esquema do designer aplicado pela fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the default data source action list items to be displayed, override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> property to return <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Se você não quiser os itens de lista padrão dados fonte ação a ser exibida, substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If you want other data source action list items to be displayed, override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> to return <see langword="false" /> and override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists" /> property to add the appropriate <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" /> objects to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Substituir se desejar que outros itens de lista de ação da fonte de dados a ser exibido, o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> para retornar <see langword="false" /> e substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists" /> propriedade a adicionar apropriada <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" /> objetos para o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> objeto que ele retorna.
